theorem.title: Area Between Curves
theorem.p: Let f,g be continuous functions, and let f(x)\leq g(x) for all x in [a,b]. The area A of the region bounded by the curves y=f(x),y=g(x) and the lines x=a,x=b is given by A = \ds \int_a^b (f(x)-g(x))\, dx
